snippet: Rafael Nadal slumped in a changeover chair, the blood pressure gauge strapped to his mighty left arm serving as a scoreboard....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal slumped in a changeover chair, the blood pressure gauge strapped to his mighty left arm serving as a scoreboard.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Retires in 3rd Set at Miami Open Against Dzumhur
